channel.title: 2 clicks client crash x64bit
channel.description:
# # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d46, pid=6196, tid=6564 # # JRE version: 6.0_16-b01 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.2-b01 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d46] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp
i use a x64 Vista OS trough this i got a diff version of java so after 2 clicks in game the client crashes and i get this error. i know their is a sulotion to this by adding something in the rune.bat or something like that idk :p anyway hopefully you can help me thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2009, 12:12:26 pm[/size][hr]aww... still no reply.
